name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Team of Cryplect filtering/sorting v0.2

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Can filter and sort own team in Cryplect

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Users of Cryplect can perform filtering or sorting functions of "My Team" accorting to their needs.


Information of extension

Upcoming implementations

1. Use google sheets (filled up with known information of LKL injuries) to filter those player who are injured.
2. Show players statistics during filtering.


Second version(v0.2) released: 2023-01-17 (updated: 2023-01-19)

Modified:
1.Filtering by teams which are playing on selected day (now uses LKL website to get most recent information of team roster)

Added:
1. Some of players names are not the same in Cryplect and LKL websites. So added players "bindings" to solve that issue
Whole information is saved in google sheets: Cryplect and LKL players names binding

2. Added about information


Initial version(v0.1) released: 2022-11-21

Added:
1. Filtering by scarcity
2. Filtering by teams which are playing on selected day
3. Sorting by team city, scarcity, player's position or player's name



Disclaimer: there is no 100% guarantee that extension works as it should (because Cryplect website is updating frequently) and human factory.
Anyway, this tool was made to help users. So please enjoy it and use it for free.
